data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Eɠɛʋelei Yedutun la. Davide ná-guyei.
GALA gila kpegi ʋɔ bɛ ɠa nà ziilɛigi zɔlɔɔ ná,
Tɔ ɠila kpegi ɠa é bɛ̀ ga fasai ta kizogi,
Yeeɠɛɠala lielegɔ ɠa wo kɛɛzu, wo ɗa ɠili ɓɔɠɔ ʋa zunu ɠilagi laalɔɠɔma,
Ti deveiti boga ga ti too, ti kula tosu wolai.
GALA gila kpegi ʋɔ bɛ ɠa nà ziilɛigi zɔlɔɔ ná,
Tɔ ɠila kpegi ɠa é bɛ̀ ga fasai ta kizogi,
Nà-kizogi, nà-lɛbiyai, ti kpein sɛlɛgɛ GALA ba.
Nuɓusɛiti, à ɠaliva tɔun ma yeenɔpɛ!
Ungo, Adama leaiti ta nɔ ga fiilɛi é leʋesu.
Ɗa ɓalaagi, Màliɠii, wooɠɛɠiladai ɠa ga ɗɔnɔ,
